subject: Re: my api is running slowly

messages.content:
Subject: Re: my api is running slowly

[FOLLOW-UP to ticket TKT-1769915811376]

Original issue: api is running very slowly with intermittent outages

Customer follow-up: production in us-east-1. its slowing down when we make concurrent api calls

extracted_fields.reproduction_steps: when we make concurrent api calls
extracted_fields.impact: slowing down during concurrent API calls

merged_extracted_fields.reproduction_steps: when we make concurrent api calls
merged_extracted_fields.impact: slowing down during concurrent API calls

current_triage.rationale: The customer reports that the API is running slowly with intermittent outages, which indicates a major issue affecting functionality.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to bug classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P1 priority. Escalated per enterprise account policy.
